Name: Adjusted money value
Description: For reporting both measured and adjusted money values

Properties.Name: Adjusted value
Properties.Description: The value of this measurement after being adjusted for time and currency.

Properties.Name: Adjustment currency
Properties.Description: The currency into which the original measure value has been adjusted.

Properties.Name: Adjustment date
Properties.Description: The date to which the original measured value has been adjusted.

Properties.Name: Measurement currency
Properties.Description: The currency in which the value was originally measured.

Properties.Name: Measurement date
Properties.Description: The date the measurement was taken

Properties.Name: Measurement value
Properties.Description: The value as it was originally measured
